Room.Name: Goblin Treasure Guard Post
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a hidden guard room overlooking the goblin's treasure room.
Room.LongDescription: On the northern wall there are several peep holes at about the height of your stomach. You realize they allow someone to peer into the goblin treasure room next door. Next to each hole is a small wooden stool, and a table for drinks and snacks. There seems to be a system of alarms overhead.
